content.query:
CREATE PROC spWait @Seconds INT
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @BEGIN DATETIME
    DECLARE @END DATETIME 

    SET @BEGIN = GETDATE()
    SET @END = DATEADD("SECOND",@Seconds,@BEGIN)

    WHILE (@BEGIN<@END)
    BEGIN   
        SET @BEGIN=GETDATE()
    END

END

Select * FROM [01_Franmer_Demo_Heap]
EXEC spWait 10
Select * FROM NYCTaxiTripSmall
